page.title: 06LOWESWATER, CLUBS
page.content: Loweswater W.I. was started in February 1938. Meetings held regularly every second Wednesday of the month in the Village Hall at 7pm. A working committee of 9 and a membership of 26. Talks about The Local Emergency Service, 47th Birthday Dinner, A Visit to the Workington Independent Hospital, Flower Arranging, Cookery, Knitting and Cake Icing. A Mystery Trip by Coach, Talk of the past and bygones, a slide show and a Christmas Party, when husbands are invited. '77 Club was started in Jubilee Year by a teenager working for her Duke of Edinburgh Award: originally for Senior Citizens but now open to all ages. Meeting once a month from October to June the times vary with the meetings being at lunchtime and teatime in local hotels and the evening meetings in the Village Hall.
